title: Upcoming Firefighter Training Class!
lede: Our SJIF&R volunteer Firefighter/ EMTs s train hard and are committed to serve you. No matter what time of the day. No matter what the weather. Come join our team!

sections.copy:
Come by Fire Station 31, 1011 Mullis Street or call us - [(360) 378-5334](tel:360-378-5334) to find out how you can join us in serving our community!! Additional details [here](https://sjifire.netlify.app/blog/2021-11-10-become-a-volunteer-emergency-responder-with-san-juan-island-fire-and-rescue/).

Thank you always for your support.
